```{r echo=TRUE}

library(reactR)
library(htmltools)

browsable(tagList(
  tags$div(id = "app"),
  tags$script(
    "
      ReactDOM.render(
        React.createElement(
          'p',
          null,
          'Powered by React'
        ),
        document.getElementById('app')
      )
    "
  ),
  #add core-js first to work in RStudio Viewer
  html_dependency_corejs(),
  html_dependency_react()
))
```

```{r echo=TRUE}

library(reactR)
library(htmltools)

script = '
function a(){
  console.log("clicked")
}

ReactDOM.render(<button onClick={a}>Powered By React/JSX</button>,document.getElementById("app2"))'

browsable(tagList(
        tags$div(id = "app2"),
        tags$script(
                 babel_transform(script)

        ),
        #add core-js first to work in RStudio Viewer
        html_dependency_corejs(),
        html_dependency_react()
))
```
